pullRequest.body:
This PR contains the formalisation of the infinite adele ring and the adele ring of a number field.

---

Note: this replaces the PR #13577 (I will close that one when this gets merged). 

- [x] depends on: #16483

<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

For details on the "pull request lifecycle" in mathlib, please see:
https://leanprover-community.github.io/contribute/index.html

In particular, note that most reviewers will only notice your PR
if it passes the continuous integration checks.
Please ask for help on https://leanprover.zulipchat.com if needed.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> Mathlib.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

### PR summary [1422608887](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/16485/commits/1422608887dec761c42af7780d90bca5c60a62b5)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|
| `Mathlib.NumberTheory.NumberField.AdeleRing`|2304|

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ AdeleRing`
`+ InfiniteAdeleRing`
`+ algebraMap_apply`
`+ algebraMap_fst_apply`
`+ algebraMap_injective`
`+ algebraMap_snd_apply`
`+ instance : Algebra K (AdeleRing K) := Prod.algebra _ _ _`
`+ instance : Algebra K (InfiniteAdeleRing K) := Pi.algebra _ _`
`+ instance : CommRing (AdeleRing K) := Prod.instCommRing`
`+ instance : CommRing (InfiniteAdeleRing K) := Pi.commRing`
`+ instance : Inhabited (AdeleRing K) := ‚ü®0‚ü©`
`+ instance : Inhabited (InfiniteAdeleRing K) := ‚ü®0‚ü©`
`+ instance : TopologicalRing (AdeleRing K) := instTopologicalRingProd`
`+ instance : TopologicalRing (InfiniteAdeleRing K) := Pi.instTopologicalRing`
`+ instance : TopologicalSpace (AdeleRing K) := instTopologicalSpaceProd`
`+ instance : TopologicalSpace (InfiniteAdeleRing K) := Pi.topologicalSpace`
`+ instance [NumberField K] : Nontrivial (InfiniteAdeleRing K)`
`+ locallyCompactSpace`
`+ mixedEmbedding_eq_algebraMap_comp`
`+ principalSubgroup`
`+ ringEquiv_mixedSpace`
`+ ringEquiv_mixedSpace_apply`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/11757110029/job/32753983556)
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/11757110029/job/32753983613)

LGTM, thanks! (Just waiting for another pair of eyes having a look).

A very minor comment: in the PR description, if you have any comments (like "This replace the other PR), you can put after the line (I did it), so it doesn't appear in the commit message.

LGTM, thanks! (Just waiting for another pair of eyes having a look).

A very minor comment: in the PR description, if you have any comments (like "This replace the other PR), you can put after the line (I did it), so it doesn't appear in the commit message.

```suggestion
variable (K : Type*) [Field K]
```
You are only using the variable v at two places so I think it is better to define it there (see also below) than globally.

```suggestion
theorem algebraMap_fst_apply (x : K) (v : InfinitePlace K) : 
    (algebraMap K (AdeleRing K) x).1 v = x := rfl
```
Furthermore, if you define v here it is consistent with the definition of `algebraMap_snd_apply` since otherwise `v` comes before `x`.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: the adele ring of a number field
